name: SNACK HUNTER!
description: You and your family have just arrived on a strange planet known as Terra. Hungry and no knowledge of where to go and what to eat, you infiltrate one of the giant's houses. This is where you see a ton of eatables somehow falling from the sky and onto a high platform... but then you start hearing noises. This is your moment to get as much food as possible in order to survive... that's if you don't get crushed however.
